title: Why are you reworking Akali?
body:
I just don't play her anymore because you nerfed her into the ground.

Then nerfed her some more.

And a bit more.

Then buffed everyone but Hybrids which was really another nerf.

And you hate Hybrids.

replies.body: Akali is bs, to many bronzies like me dont abuse her pre six, she then snowballs out of control to the point she can 1v 4.
you player her kinda ad bruiser wit ha gunblade for the lols, the sustain on e is pretty bs, especially if you have that 400-600 heal going off about twice a second

Riot doesn't hate hybrids, they just haven't done anything to support hybrids.

I remember watching a video they released a while back (think it was a patch rundown) and they were talking at one point how they have never really looked at helping hybrids exist even though there are many champions that are hybrid.
